headline.main: Ah, Finally, Ancient Clay Tablets for Dessert

docs.snippet: You know all about the cuneiform written by scribes thousands of years ago. Of course, you do. A museum staff member created a modern take on the language, in the form of cookies....
docs.abstract: Katy Blanchard, head of Near Eastern collections at University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, has started trend by baking cuneiform tablets in gingerbread for colleagues.

keywords.value: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: You know all about the cuneiform written by scribes thousands of years ago. Of course, you do. A museum staff member created a modern take on the language, in the form of cookies.

headline.main: Trial Over LGBT House Bill 2 Delayed Until Late Next Summer
headline.print_headline: Trial Over LGBT House Bill 2 Delayed Until Late Next Summer

docs.snippet: A federal trial on the legality of a North Carolina law limiting which restrooms transgender people can use in schools and government buildings has been pushed back until at least late summer....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal trial on the legality of a North Carolina law limiting which restrooms transgender people can use in schools and government buildings has been pushed back until at least late summer.

headline.main: Judge Says Ex-U.S. Presidential Yacht Can Be Sold for $0
headline.print_headline: Judge Says Ex-U.S. Presidential Yacht Can Be Sold for $0

docs.snippet: A Delaware judge said on Monday the former presidential yacht, the USS Sequoia, could be acquired by an investment group for zero dollars, ending a years-long dispute over the storied ship once used by John F. Kennedy....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Delaware judge said on Monday the former presidential yacht, the USS Sequoia, could be acquired by an investment group for zero dollars, ending a years-long dispute over the storied ship once used by John F. Kennedy.

headline.main: Poland Signs Deal to Buy 2 US-Made Gulfstream VIP Planes
headline.print_headline: Poland Signs Deal to Buy 2 US-Made Gulfstream VIP Planes

docs.snippet: Poland has signed a 440.5 million-zloty ($108 million) deal to purchase two small U.S.-made Gulfstream G550 planes to fly government members and other top politicians on foreign visits....
docs.lead_paragraph: Poland has signed a 440.5 million-zloty ($108 million) deal to purchase two small U.S.-made Gulfstream G550 planes to fly government members and other top politicians on foreign visits.

headline.main: UAE Court Jails Three Men for Involvement in Banned Groups
headline.print_headline: UAE Court Jails Three Men for Involvement in Banned Groups

docs.snippet: A court in the United Arab Emirates on Monday jailed two citizens of the Gulf Arab state to 10 and seven years in jail for membership of a "banned secret organization", state news agency WAM reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: A court in the United Arab Emirates on Monday jailed two citizens of the Gulf Arab state to 10 and seven years in jail for membership of a "banned secret organization", state news agency WAM reported.

headline.main: San Marino Offer Stinging Response to Mueller's Criticism
headline.print_headline: San Marino Offer Stinging Response to Mueller's Criticism

docs.snippet: San Marino officials strongly criticised Thomas Mueller in an open letter on Monday after the German attacking midfielder made disparaging comments about the tiny European nation following Friday's World Cup qualifier....

headline.main: Trump's Post-Election Twitter Activity at a Glance
headline.print_headline: Trump's Post-Election Twitter Activity at a Glance

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump said in a Sunday interview with CBS's "60 Minutes" — taped Friday — that he would be "very restrained" when it comes to Twitter. But he has offered a variety of messages on the social media site since then,...
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump said in a Sunday interview with CBS's "60 Minutes" — taped Friday — that he would be "very restrained" when it comes to Twitter. But he has offered a variety of messages on the social media site since then, raising questions about how restrained he might be on Twitter when he becomes president in January 2017. headline.main: South Africa Lose Lock Etzebeth for Italy Test
headline.print_headline: South Africa Lose Lock Etzebeth for Italy Test

docs.snippet: Powerful lock Eben Etzebeth has been ruled out of South Africa's test against Italy on Saturday after suffering a concussion in last weekend's 37-21 defeat by England, South African Rugby said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Powerful lock Eben Etzebeth has been ruled out of South Africa's test against Italy on Saturday after suffering a concussion in last weekend's 37-21 defeat by England, South African Rugby said on Monday.
